<p><b>
Use the map below to scrool through the area of Picton!
</b></p>


```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.height=7, fig.width=18, fig.align='right'}
library(htmlwidgets)
library(knitr)


m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=172.636919, lat=-43.532214, popup="Christchurch")
m%>% setView(172.707324, -43.532214, zoom = 10) 
m

opts_chunk$set(comment="", fig.align="center", tidy=TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```
